name: Tricep Pushdown on Cable
how_to_perform:
1. Start with the bar attached to a cable machine at chest height.
2. Hold a handle with your hands shoulder-width apart, and place your arms straight down so that only your arms are holding the handle.
3. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine and keep your back flat.
4. Slowly push the handle away from you while extending your arms fully, focusing on using only your triceps to extend.
5. Keep your elbows close to your body throughout the movement.
6. Lower the handle down to the starting position by slowly bending your elbows and allowing your arms to return to a straight position.
short_summary: Tricep pushdowns on cable are an isolation exercise for the triceps that involves extending the arm away from the body using a cable machine.
